title: Delete a reservation group
description: Deletes a reservation group from the BigQuery Reservation API. A reservation group can only be deleted if it does not contain any child reservations.

objective.narrative: This sample demonstrates how to programmatically remove a reservation group that is no longer needed. This might be part of a cleanup script or an automated resource management process where reservation structures are dynamically created and removed based on workload demands.

regionTags.name: bigqueryreservation_v1_reservationservice_reservationgroup_delete
